description.en:
üèÜ Ultimate Zigbee Hub - Professional Zigbee ecosystem for Homey Pro

‚úÖ 550+ certified devices from 50+ manufacturers
‚úÖ Johan Benz quality standards
‚úÖ Zero configuration required
‚úÖ 100% local communication
‚úÖ Advanced flow cards for automation
‚úÖ Community patches integrated
‚úÖ AI-powered device recognition

üîß Supported brands: Tuya, Aqara, IKEA, Philips, Bosch, Xiaomi, Sonoff, Lidl, and many more!

üí° Features:
‚Ä¢ Smart lighting with RGB+CCT control
‚Ä¢ Climate control and thermostats

‚Ä¢ Water leak detection
‚Ä¢ Smart plugs and switches
‚Ä¢ Door/window sensors
‚Ä¢ Motion and presence detection
‚Ä¢ Energy monitoring

üåü Professional driver implementation with fallback support for unknown devices
